long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control over your digital safety. Guardio helps safeguard your digital activities and personal data by blocking harmful sites and downloads, identifying suspicious emails, and securing your accounts against scams, phishing, financial fraud, and identity theft.
The browser extension is complemented by a mobile app, offering protection across devices. Both solutions operate continuously and update automatically. Users can access 24/7 human support. Notifications are sent only when action is required for your security.

How does it work? 
• Install the browser extension and consider downloading the mobile app for comprehensive protection.
• Run a security check-up to identify potential security issues.
• Sign up to a Premium plan - it includes a 7-day free trial with full features. You can also get basic online protection by choosing to the Basic/free plan. 
• Ongoing protection: Security features run in the background to continuously monitor risks.

What’s included?
For customers of the Basic plan:
• Fake website alerts on your computer

For customers of the Premium plan:
Security features:
• Fake site blocks
• Malicious download blocks
• Identity and personal data monitoring
• Data leak alerts
• Email phishing security 
• Text message filter
• Malicious pop-up blocks
• Cross-device protection, browser extension, and a Mobile App
• 24/7 security hotline and human support
• $1M identity theft coverage

Recent mentions:
• PC Mag: “Perfect phishing protection”
• Techradar: “Guardio is simple to set up and use, budget-friendly, and does a superb job of keeping its users safe.”
